* Function to preLoad the file into the duke ArrayList before
* Function to parse in user input
*  @param exec The command to be parsed.
BufferedWriter fileWriter = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(fileName, true));
bufferedWriter.write("E" + sep + tempStatus + sep + desc + sep+ time);
bufferedWriter.write("D" + sep + tempStatus + sep + desc + sep+ time);
* Function to rewrite the whole taskList to file
bufferedWriter.write("E" + sep + tempStatus + sep + desc + sep+ time);
bufferedWriter.write("D" + sep + tempStatus + sep + desc + sep+ time);
* Function to load save inputs into taskList
*  Method to add a task to taskList
System.out.println("Got it. I've added this task: ");
System.out.println("Now you have " + taskList.size() + " tasks in the list.");
*  Print the description of the stored taskList
*  function to call loading of past saved data into the taskList array
*  Method to mark the task Number as complete
System.out.println("Nice! I've marked this task as done: ");
*  Method to  format the input date into a specific date string.
format = new SimpleDateFormat("dd MMMM yyyy,hh:mm a");
* @param taskNumber the task number to remove
System.out.println("Now you have " + taskList.size() + " in the list.");
System.out.println("Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");
System.out.println("Hello! I'm Duke\nWhat can I do for you?\n");
*  Method to state there is an unknown command has been detected
*  Method to state out of range error message detected
*  Method to state missing argument from command input detected
*  Method to state wrong formatting of date detected
*  Method to empty description input detected
*  Method to state failure to find keyword
assertEquals("[D][✗] return book (by: 02 December 2019,06:00 PM)", result);
